humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor as 3.3x2.6x2.5 cm. According to the rules, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage of a cancer is determined by the size of the primary tumor. In this report, the size of the invasive ductal carcinoma is given as 3.3x2.6x2.5 cm. According to the TNM staging system for breast cancer, a T2 stage tumor has a size of 2.0 to 5.0 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
